titles: A good and seasonable caveat for Christians. Delivered in a sermon at the funerall of the right worshipfull Sir Charles Shirley, Knight and baronet, in the parish church of Breedon, in Leicester-Shire. / By John Wilson, Master of Arts, and preacher of Gods word in the sayd parish. 7. Octob. 1646. Imprimatur, Jo. Downame.
author: Wilson, John, of Breedon, Leicestershire.
publisher: Printed for Richard Harper, and are to be sold at his shop in Smithfield,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Shirley, Charles, --  Sir, 1623-1646 --  Early works to 1800.
God --  Worship and love --  Sermons --  Early works to 1800.
